name: Roads of Rome
description: Advance into the unknown territories full of secrets and dangers. Expand the famous road system to the far corners of mighty Roman Empire in this blend of casual strategy, sim and time management genres!
minimum_requirements: Minimální: Operační systém: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 10 Procesor: Pentium III 800MHz Paměť: 256 MB RAM Grafická karta: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM Pevný disk: 74 MB volného místa

reviews.review_text: Very similar gameplay to the 12 Labours of Hercules series but not quite as polished. Gets slightly trickier towards the end and may need a couple of attempts on one or two of the later levels to get the expert score.  Fairly short and fun enough for the price, but needs an option to adjust screen resolution, and you really miss the ability to queue actions in advance.
